MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart is still ongoing. This is due to problems getting equipment to site and we now expect power to be back on by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:29pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
